word: G1295 - διασώζω - diasṓzō - dee-as-odze'-o - Bring safe

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - சொஸ்தமாக்கு, குணமாக்கு, பத்திரமாய் கொண்டுபோ, காப்பாற்று, தப்புவி
to preserve through danger, to bring safe through; to save, cure one who is sick

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G1223 and G4982; to save thoroughly, that is, (by implication or analogy) to cure, preserve, rescue, etc.: - bring safe, escape (safe), heal, make perfectly whole, save.
